title: Fund burner module with 29M BZE
description: If this proposal passed the Burner module will be funded with 29M BZE from the Community Pool, leaving more than 50M BZE coins available for community funding. BZE Alpha Team proposes the funding of the Burner module in order to lower the total supply and decrease the number coins minted yearly. The burning proposal will be submitted as soon as this one passes.
